casebody.data:
In the Matter of Appeal of Tyleta MORGAN. No. 582A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 2, 2008. Charles C. Meeker, Benn A. Brewington, III, Raleigh, for Henderson County. Paul A. Meyer, Raleigh, for NC Asso. County Commissioners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of April 2008 by Appellee (Tyleta Morgan) to Reschedule Oral Argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of April 2008."
